messages.subject: high school course description (science etc) transcription
messages.msgSnippet: I am trying to figure out how to put my sons activities into educationize.  I am not sure what would be considered ok for high school freshman courses.....he
messages.messageBody:
I am trying to figure out how to put my sons activities into
educationize. I am not sure what would be considered ok for high
school freshman courses.....he did several things that could fall under
several categories. I am thinking. astronomy, general science type.
but he also watched a lot of how things are made stuff. are there any
good simple sites that have unschooling info for this stuff cause i
have examples of traditional transcripts and that is easy but I need to
convert the unschooling stuff into traditional looking transcript.

Thanks,
kim
